card.name: Underworld Dreams
card.ability: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Underworld Dreams deals 1 damage to him or her.
card.flavor: "In the drowsy dark cave of the mind, dreams build their nest with fragments dropped from day's caravan." -Rabindranath Tagore
card.ruling:
10/4/2004: If multiple cards are drawn at once, this card triggers once for each card drawn.

10/4/2004: In a multi-player game, it affects all opponents.
